description: '''Ambient techno''' is a subgenre of [[techno]] that incorporates the atmospheric [[Texture (music)|textures]] of [[ambient music]] with the rhythmic elements and [[Music production|production]] of techno. It was pioneered by 1990s electronic artists such as [[Aphex Twin]], [[Carl Craig]], [[The Orb]], [[The Future Sound of London]], [[The Black Dog (band)|the Black Dog]], [[Pete Namlook]] and [[Biosphere (musician)|Biosphere]].
